description: Validator for the Voicemail callflow element

action.description: Whether to check voicemail box or compose a new voicemail message

callerid_match_login.description: Whether to match the caller ID to a voicemail box

id.description: The ID of the voicemail box

interdigit_timeout.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait for the caller to press the next digit after pressing a digit

max_message_length.description: Max length of the message that caller can leave in voicemail box

single_mailbox_login.description: Allow login if caller has a single mailbox

skip_module.description: When set to true this callflow action is skipped, advancing to the wildcard branch (if any)
